scripts.deploy: sam build --region eu-west-1 && sam package --template-file template.yml --s3-bucket %npm_package_config_bucketName% --output-template-file packaged.yaml && sam deploy --region eu-west-1 --template-file packaged.yaml --stack-name %npm_package_config_stackName% --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM && aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name %npm_package_config_stackName% --region eu-west-1 --query 'Stacks[].Outputs'
scripts.deploy-linux: sam build --region eu-west-1 && sam package --template-file template.yml --s3-bucket cf-templates-1j38krxlf5m0l-eu-west-1 --output-template-file packaged.yaml && sam deploy --region eu-west-1 --template-file packaged.yaml --stack-name social-media-stack --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM && aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name social-media-stack --region eu-west-1 --query 'Stacks[].Outputs'
